prompts: Create a cute fire-type Pokemon with a small body and a big flame on its back.
Imagine a friendly Pokemon that loves to play in warm grasslands and has vibrant orange colors.
Design a small, flame-centric Pokemon that evolves into a more powerful fire creature.
Generate a Pokemon that has a round shape and a playful personality, perfect for trainers.
Show me a fire Pokemon that can thrive in forest environments and has a unique tail feature.
Give me a Pokemon with a tiny stature and a fiery spirit, ideal for new trainers.
Make a design for a Pokemon that has a vibrant flame and is known for its friendly demeanor.
